title: Ozzy Osbourne Gets a Big Music Award
summary: Ozzy Osbourne, a famous heavy metal singer, will receive a Lifetime Achievement award at The Brit Awards. He died last July, so this award is given after his death. The ceremony is in Manchester on Saturday. His wife Sharon helped plan a special music performance with Robbie Williams to honor him. Ozzy was in a band called Black Sabbath and sold many albums. He won other awards like Grammys too. The Brit Awards are moving to Manchester for the first time, and many singers will perform that night.

background_read: Ozzy Osbourne was a famous singer known for heavy metal music. He was part of Black Sabbath and had a solo career. The Brit Awards are a big music event in the UK that gives prizes to artists. This year, they are honoring Ozzy for his long career, even though he passed away. The ceremony will have many performances by other singers.
